tool.name: Check data
tool.help:
This tool looks for potential errors in txt-converted FCS files.
-----
**Input**
This diagnosis tools reads in text files, and checks that the data is all numeric.
**Output**
The output is a report with the errors and corresponding line numbers.
-----
**Example**
*Input*::
Marker1 Marker2 Marker3 34 45 12 NaN 65 10 34 45 12 33 NaN 10 34 45 12 33 65 10 34 45 12 33 65 NaN 34 45 12 33 65 10
*Output*::
WARNING: line 2 in example_file.txt contains non-numeric results WARNING: line 4 in example_file.txt contains non-numeric results WARNING: line 8 in example_file.txt contains non-numeric results
